testcase.name: Portable Document Format extraction produces text when available and records empty output when unavailable
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Portable Document Format extraction produces text when available and records empty output when unavailable When I download a mixed corpus into "corpus" ... passed in 2.314s And I build a "pdf-text" extraction run in corpus "corpus" ... passed in 0.010s Then the extracted text for the item tagged "pdf-sample" is not empty in the latest extraction run ... passed in 0.001s And the extracted text for the item tagged "scanned" is empty in the latest extraction run ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Pass-through text extractor ignores binary items
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Pass-through text extractor ignores binary items When I download a mixed corpus into "corpus" ... passed in 2.284s And I build a "pass-through-text" extraction run in corpus "corpus" ... passed in 0.010s Then the extracted text for the item tagged "html" is not empty in the latest extraction run ... passed in 0.001s And the extraction run does not include extracted text for the item tagged "image" ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
